Dad, what time did you come home last night?
Of course I am. I'm really tired with hard work.
Then can't you take us to the zoo today?
Umm. Why don't we watch cartoons instead?
I'm sick and tired of watching cartoons at home, Dad.
Jeff and I watched cartoons yesterday.
How about playing video games then?
Don't you like playing video games?
Yes, I do like video games.
